alert.note: Alert for Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 11 at 2:29AM MDT until April 12 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 9 PM this evening to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. For the Wind Advisory, from 2 PM this afternoon to 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass
